subject: [cc-devel] wpLicense 0.7.6 Available
body:
wpLicense 0.7.6 is now available for download from 
http://mirrors.creativecommons.org/software/wplicense/download/wplicense-0.7.6.zip. 
  This release fixes an issue with wpLicense causing Atom and RSS feeds 
to be rendered improperly.  Issues may still exist with rendering and 
license selection under Internet Explorer.  Because this is a bug fix 
release, all users are encouraged to upgrade.

Comments, questions and feedback all welcome.

Nathan
